name: Tank Rush
description:
What happens in this game?
Why should an American tank fight against the same American tanks?
It's simple! You uncovered the conspiracy of General Sherman and must defeat his army.
It will not be easy. Against you are dozens of tanks from small to huge Machin. But the allies are also there.
Do not forget to pick up boxes - they contain repair kits and first-aid kits.
Good luck, General!
